topic.name: Foundations of Music Theory & Notation
topic.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Foundations of Music Theory & Notation in Fine Arts

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the 'Home' note (Do).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a chord progression.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Identify music that marches (2) vs. music that sways (3).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the 'downbeat'.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Identify if a melody goes up or down.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the difference between a step and a leap.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Intervals & Triads (Major, Minor, Diminished, Augmented)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a step (next door) vs. a skip (jumping over).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Intervals & Triads (Major, Minor, Diminished, Augmented)
objectives.objective_text: Name a chord (three notes played together).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Intervals & Triads (Major, Minor, Diminished, Augmented)
objectives.objective_text: Identify an octave.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Identify music that sounds happy (Major) vs. sad (Minor).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the Pentatonic scale (5 notes).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Identify Piano (soft) and Forte (loud).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Name Allegro (fast) and Adagio (slow).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a Fermata (hold).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Pitch & Rhythm Notation (Treble/Bass clef, notes, rests, dotted rhythms)
objectives.objective_text: Identify high and low sounds (pitch).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Pitch & Rhythm Notation (Treble/Bass clef, notes, rests, dotted rhythms)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a quarter note (ta) and eighth notes (ti-ti).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Recall a simple tune.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that the top number tells us how many beats.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Observe the strong beat at the start of a measure.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that harmony supports the melody.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Observe when a song feels finished.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Observe if a note is the same or different.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Sing a simple harmony with a friend.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Harmonize a simple melody with chords.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Intervals & Triads (Major, Minor, Diminished, Augmented)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that some sounds clash and some match.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Intervals & Triads (Major, Minor, Diminished, Augmented)
objectives.objective_text: Observe distances between notes.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that scales are steps going up and down.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Observe sharps (#) and flats (b) as black keys.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that a double bar line means the end.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Observe repeat signs.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the difference between the top and bottom numbers.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Write down a simple 4-beat rhythm heard.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Intervals & Triads (Major, Minor, Diminished, Augmented)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how to build a basic triad (Root-3rd-5th).

objectives.objective_text: Notate a simple rhythm dictated by the teacher.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Count 1-2-3-4 along with a song.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the meaning of 4/4, 3/4, and 2/4 time.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Conduct a simple 4-beat pattern.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Explain syncopation within a meter.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Time Signatures & Meter (Simple, Compound, Irregular)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the mathematical logic of metric organization.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the I, IV, and V chords.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Explain why the V chord wants to go to I.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the 12-Bar Blues progression.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Harmony Fundamentals (Tonic, Dominant, Subdominant, Roman Numeral Analysis)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the teleological nature of functional harmony.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Clap back a short rhythm.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the sound of a Major vs. Minor chord.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Sing back a short melodic phrase.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Ear Training (Interval recognition, rhythmic and melodic dictation)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the difference between hearing and listening.

objectives.objective_text: Defend the necessity of aural skills for musicianship.

objectives.objective_text: Summarize an interval by number (2nd, 3rd, 5th).

objectives.objective_text: Explain Diminished and Augmented triads.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Sing the scale (Do-Re-Mi-Fa-Sol-La-Ti-Do).

objectives.objective_text: Summarize the pattern of Whole and Half steps in a Major scale.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Explain what a Key Signature does (tells us home).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Play or sing a C Major and G Major scale.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the Blues scale structure.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Key Signatures & Scales (Major, Minor, Pentatonic, Blues, Modes)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the concept of tonality and the 'home' key.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize Italian terms for dynamics (crescendo, diminuendo).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Explain Staccato (short) vs. Legato (smooth).

objectives.objective_text: Explain Da Capo and Dal Segno structure.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Musical Terms & Symbols (Dynamics, Tempo, Articulation, Repeats)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the interpretive role of the performer.

objectives.objective_text: Clap a steady beat vs. a rhythm pattern.

objectives.objective_text: Draw a treble clef and a music staff.

objectives.objective_text: Summarize the names of the lines and spaces on the Treble Clef.

objectives.objective_text: Explain the value of a whole, half, quarter, and eighth note.

objectives.objective_text: Explain the relationship between ledger lines and pitch range.

objectives.objective_text: Defend the necessity of standardized notation for communication.

objectives.objective_text: Analyze the difference between Simple (subdivided by 2) and Compound (subdivided by 3) meter.

objectives.objective_text: Connect time signatures to dance styles (e.g., Waltz, March).

objectives.objective_text: Interpret the function of the Dominant chord.

objectives.objective_text: Connect cadences to punctuation in sentences.

objectives.objective_text: Connect the sound of a chord progression to its numerals.
